{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3381467,"name":"Ryan zheng","username":"Rzheng1232","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/rzheng1232/{size}/182897_2.png","created_at":"2024-05-07T19:48:48.266Z","cooked":"

Hey,
Is there any way I can use to customize the field2d() odometry displayer on the shuffleboard? Right now, the robot’s position is being displayed by a racecar-like thing, and I would like to change it to something else if possible.
Thanks!

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":5,"updated_at":"2024-05-07T19:48:48.266Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":6,"reads":153,"readers_count":152,"score":60.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":465450,"topic_slug":"customizing-the-default-odometry-visualization-on-shuffleboard","display_username":"Ryan zheng","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":55168,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Programmer"},"post_url":"/t/customizing-the-default-odometry-visualization-on-shuffleboard/465450/1","custom_user_title":"Programmer","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":true,"can_vote":false},{"id":3381480,"name":"Gavin Matthews","username":"bovlb","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/bovlb/{size}/167232_2.png","created_at":"2024-05-07T20:12:49.650Z","cooked":"

The glass documentation describes picking a custom robot image, but that may not behave the same in every client.

This is currently hardcoded: shuffleboard/plugins/base/src/main/java/edu/wpi/first/shuffleboard/plugin/base/widget/FieldWidget.java at main · wpilibsuite/shuffleboard · GitHub

It should be relatively easy to add a feature to make it customizable? Contributions welcome.
